message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="metaphysics-expert" color="blue" summary="AGREE with final proposal, accept majority on Essay 4">
**AGREE.**

My amendment on the Essay 4 reversal was outvoted 6-3 and I accept the majority position. The reasoning is sound — the experiential power lies in the *process* of tracking the reversal step by step, not in the surprise of learning it exists. The essay itself announces what it will do before doing it.

The Zeroth Reality point I raised has been incorporated into Section B (Kantian parallels), which I'm satisfied with.

The final proposal is well-constructed. No further objections.
</teammate-message>

content.text:
Good — the metaphysics expert formally accepts the majority position on line 97 and AGREEs with the full proposal. Both registered dissents (metaphysics on Edit 4, translator-2 on Edit 3) are now formally resolved as non-blocking.

**Final tally: 11/11 AGREE.** Standing by for user's go-ahead to apply edits and produce DRAFT-R3.
